TitleEnglish: OKITSURA: Fell in Love with an Okinawan Girl, but I Just Wish I Know What She's Saying
SummaryEnglish: When Teruaki Nakamura transfers to laid-back Okinawa, he falls for the lively Kyan-san—but her dialect is a complete mystery to him. With Higa-san translating, Teru’s misunderstanding-filled island life takes off...and subtle hints suggest Higa-san might want his heart too. On this serene island, love flows as freely as the ocean breeze!
Aliases: The Girl I Fell for in Okinawa Has a Difficult Dialect
OKITSURA Fell in Love with an Okinawan Girl, but I Just Wish I Know What She's Saying
The Dialect of the Girl I Fell in Love With in Okinawa Is Too Difficult to Deal With
Okinawa de Suki ni Natta Ko ga Hougen Sugite Tsurasugiru
Okinawa de Suki ni Natta Ko ga Hōgen Sugite Tsurasugiru
The Girl I Ended Up Falling in Love Within Okinawa Has Too Heavy of a Dialect and Is a Pain to Deal With
Fell in Love with an Okinawan Girl, but I Just Wish I Knew What She's Saying

1.TitleEnglish: The Girl I Like Speaks in Uchinaaguchi
1.SummaryEnglish: Nakamura Teruaki has moved south to Okinawa from Tokyo and fallen in love with a local girl. There's just one problem, though: her Okinawan dialect is so thick that he can't understand a word she says!

2.TitleEnglish: A Beach Party Is Just a Social Gathering?!
2.SummaryEnglish: Teruaki is excited for the big class beach party, but he's the only one who wants to swim?!

3.SummaryEnglish: Teruaki learns more about Okinawan traditions, goes to a festival... and sneaks off somewhere "naughty"?!

4.TitleEnglish: Blow Your Finger Whistle at the Beautiful Sea!
4.SummaryEnglish: Teruaki learns to whistle, and how the Okinawans dance.

5.SummaryEnglish: Teruaki tries on what he thinks is just a Hawaiian shirt, and discovers it has a deeper history than he imagines.

6.SummaryEnglish: Teruaki learns the history of Okinawan soba, and a typhoon closes in.

7.SummaryEnglish: Teruaki learns the sorrowful tale of the time mongooses were brought to Okinawa.

8.TitleEnglish: Yui Rail Rides to the Music!
8.SummaryEnglish: Teruaki discovers that there are no trains in Okinawa.

9.SummaryEnglish: Kyan tells Suzu the story of the Iriomote cat and its ancient history.

10.TitleEnglish: The True Identity of the Yaaruu?!
10.SummaryEnglish: Teruaki takes Higa on a test of courage and is shocked by what he finds.

11.SummaryEnglish: Teruaki learns the truth about goya and gooyaa.

12.SummaryEnglish: Kyan panics when she finds out that Teruaki likes her.
